org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield
Class StretchBendInteractions

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield.StretchBendInteractions

public class StretchBendInteractions
extends java.lang.Object

Stretch-Bend Interaction calculator for the potential energy function. Include function and derivatives.

Author:
vlabarta
Created on:
2005-02-15
Belongs to CDK module:

                                           java.util.Map parameterSet,
                                           boolean angleBendingFlag)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
Set MMFF94 reference bond lengths r0IJ and r0JK and stretch-bend interaction constants kbaIJK and kbaKJI for each i-j-k angle in the molecule.
